Class Less

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOp
org.tensorflow.op.math.Less
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.tensorflow.ndarray.Shaped, Op, Operand<TBool>
@Operator(group="math") public final class Less extends RawOp implements Operand<TBool>
Returns the truth value of (x < y) element-wise. NOTE: math.Less supports broadcasting. More about broadcasting here

Example: 

x = tf.constant([5, 4, 6])
y = tf.constant([5])
tf.math.less(x, y) ==> [False, True, False]

x = tf.constant([5, 4, 6])
y = tf.constant([5, 6, 7])
tf.math.less(x, y) ==> [False, True, True]

    • asOutput

      public Output<TBool> asOutput()
      Description copied from interface: Operand
      Returns the symbolic handle of the tensor.

      Inputs to TensorFlow operations are outputs of another TensorFlow operation. This method is used to obtain a symbolic handle that represents the computation of the input.

      Specified by:
      asOutput in interface Operand<TBool>
      See Also:
      • OperationBuilder.addInput(Output)
